mdRecord.dcterms:title: Personal Correspondence to C.M. Stigeman at Shawsville from J.H. Hinston
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Personal correspondence, October 14,1853, to C.M. Stigeman at Shawsville, Momtgomery Cty, VA from J.H. Hinston of Floyd CH, VA, 2 original pages and 2 photocopies.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Records and correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
